IsoCountry.description: The [ISO country code](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) of the pricing information to fetch.

$ul: **outbound_prefix_prices**: The list of OutboundPrefixPrice records, which include a list of the `prefixes`, the `friendly_name`, `base_price`, and the   `current_price` for those prefixes.
**price_unit**: The currency in which prices are measured, specified in [ISO 4127](http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/currency_codes.htm) format (e.g. `usd`, `eur`, `jpy`).
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
